channel.title: WS on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in WS on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Countries : CRUD
item.description: Countries : CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Request with method GET and Basic Auth AAA_WSKEY_AAA the endpoint http://domain.tld/api/countries The response HTTP Code is 200 The XML code has a prestashop root node The root node has a countries node The countries node has children nodes named country with not empty attributes id (numeric), and xlink:href (string) Request with method POST and Basic Auth AAA_WSKEY_AAA the endpoint [http://domain.
